name: MTS 2 – Mobile Theme Switcher 2
author: Juergen Schulze

sections.description:
! ! ! S T I L L B E T A ! ! !

Bypass mobile users to a leaner, customized theme. Differentiate between lot’s of different devices.

Thanks to Tareq Hasan tareq@weDevs.com for class.settings-api.php

Remove plugin

  1. Deactivate plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  2. Delete plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

It’s best to use the build in delete function of wordpress. That way all the stored data will be removed and no orphaned data will stay.

sections.installation:
1. Upload plugin to the /wp-content/plugins/ folder
  2. Upload a mobile theme to the ‘/wp-content/themes/’ folder and customize it
  3. Activate the plugin
  4. Open the “Mobile Them Switcher” options page under the ‘Appearance’ menu in WordPress.
  5. Select a mobile compatible WordPress theme
sections.faq:
Why should I show an alternative theme to mobile users?

Check you website with mobiReady. This will give you an answer

What mobile theme should I use?

You can start your search at wordpress.org

How can I create my own mobile theme?

Find yourselself a good mobile theme. Use it to work on a derivated child theme (never touch the original theme!)

How can I test my theme?

I use the Opera Mobile Emulator. Start a new emulation and type “opera:config” into URL. That way you can change the Mobile user agent string to your gusto. Or take user agent switcher plugin for Firefox

How can I support you?

Post a comment on MTS 2 – Mobile Theme Switcher 2

What is the plugin page?

MTS 2 – Mobile Theme Switcher 2

Do you have other plugins?

Check out my other WordPress Plugins

Where do I post my feedback?

Post it at the plugin page: MTS 2 – Mobile Theme Switcher 2
